text.verse: Blessed are You Truly : with Your Good Father : and the Holy Spirit : for You have come and saved us.
text.phonics: Ek-esmaro-oot alithos: nem pek yot en agathos: nem pi epnevma ethowab: je ak-ee ak-soti emmon.

text.verse: Through the prayers: of our honored father: the high priest Papa Abba Tawadros, and our father the Bishop/Metropolitan Abba (…) O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
text.phonics: Hiten ni-evshi: ente penyot ettayoot en arshee erevs Papa Avva Tawadros: nem peniot enepiskopos/emmetropolitees Avva (…) Epshois ari-ehmot nan empiko evol ente nennovi.

text.verse: Rejoice O Theotokos, the Virgin, the intercessor of the world to the Savior our God; we present praise to Him, and we exalt you.
text.phonics: Shere Theotoke parthene o epres-vevoo ce ee-pertoo kosmoo ton sotiria ke ton Theon e-moun, epros-ferin pan taton em-non ee-moun, cemega-linomen.

text.verse: Rejoice O Theotokos, the Virgin, the Mother of Emmanuel who is not provoked with marriage.
text.phonics: Shere Theotoke parthene, Meeter too Emmanueel tees pina pirogami.

text.verse: Rejoice O you who is of the rank of the angels; Rejoice O our intercessor before our God the Father; We exalt you.
text.phonics: Shere thea-e-taksis en-angelon, shere thea-eprostasia e-moun too Patri ke ton Theon e-moun, cemega-linomen.

text.verse: Rejoice O Mother of God, the Virgin, to You O God is due praise in Zion, and the vows will be fulfilled to You in Jerusalem: We exalt you.
text.phonics: Shere Theo-toke parthene: enthok evnoti efer-shav nak: enje pigo khen Sion: ev-a-tee nak enhan-evki khen Yero-saleem: cemegalinomen.

text.verse: Rejoice O you full of grace, Mary, the Lord is with you.
text.phonics: Shere ke kari-tomenee Maria O Kirios metacou

text.verse: The Lord is with you.  Holy is, the Father, the King Who observes our humility, the essence of glory, with the Holy Spirit.
text.phonics: O Kee-rios metaso. agios istin: opateer vasilevsin: the-pen-thevio: genos enzoxin: tou epnevma to agio:

text.verse: Just is, the Father, our supporter in our weaknesses, for the sake of the Heavenly life, with the Holy Spirit.
text.phonics: Zee-keos istin: opateer eovoeethin: the-penthevio: zoeen en-eporanion: tou epnevma to agio:

text.verse: Praise belongs to the Father, the treasure of our humility, and Jesus Who is from Heaven, with the Holy Spirit
text.phonics: Ee-panos istin: opateer the-savrin: the-penthevio: ieesos en-eporanion: to epnevma tou agio:

text.verse: The Lord, the Father, Who speaks in Heavenly truth, Who took the form of our humility, with the Holy Spirit
text.phonics: Kee-rios istin: opateer lalevsin: the-penthevio: matos en-eporanion: to epnevma tou agio:

text.verse: Honored is the Father, Who rejoices because of our Humility, the Heavenly Truth, with the Holy Spirit.
text.phonics: Nee-mios istin: opateer exalevsin: the-penthevio: ondos en-eporanion: to epnevma to agio:

text.verse: The Father is the Shepherd, Who speaks for the sake of our tribulations, the heavenly cross, with the Holy Spirit
text.phonics: Pee-menos istin: opateer raravsin: the-penthevio: estavros en-eporanion: to epnevma to agio:

text.verse: Honored is the Father, Who shines over our tribulations, with the heavenly light, with the Holy Spirit
text.phonics: Tee-mios istin: opateer emonfin: the-penthevio: vosteer en-eporanion: to epnevma to agio:

text.verse: Hail to the ever-existent, with the Father who rejoices in our humility, and the heavenly truth, with the Holy Spirit
text.phonics: Shere istin istin: opateer epsalevsin: the-penthevio: ondos en-eporanion: to epnevma to agio:

text.verse: Seven times everyday, I will praise Your name, with all my heart, O God of everyone.
text.phonics: Shashf ensop emmeenee: evol khen paheet tierf: tee-na esmou epekran: eptchois empee e-eptierf.

text.verse: I remembered Your name, and I was comforted, O King of the ages, and God of all gods.
text.phonics: Ai erev mev-ee empekran: Owoh ai jem nomtee: ep’ouro ennee e’on: Evnoutee ente ni- noutee.

text.verse: Jesus Christ our true God, who has come, for our salvation, was incarnate.
text.phonics: Isos pee-ekhrestos pennotee: pee aleethinos: Vee etaf ee ethve pensotee: afersoma teekos.

text.verse: He was incarnate, of the Holy Spirit, and of Mary, the pure bride.
text.phonics: Af etshy sarx evol: khen pee epnevma ethowab: nem evol khen Maria: tee shelet ethowab.

text.verse: And changed our sorrow, and all our troubles, to joy for our hearts, and total rejoicing.
text.phonics: Afvonh empen heevee : nem pen hog heg tierf: e-ourashee enheet: nem outheleel e-eptierf.

text.verse: Let us worship Him, and sing to, His mother Mary, the beautiful dove.
text.phonics: Maren ou-osht emmof: o-woh enten er hymnos: entef mav Maria: tee-etshrompee ethnesos.

text.verse: And let us all proclaim, with the voice of joy, saying Hail to you Mary, the Mother of Emmanuel.
text.phonics: O-woh enten osh evol: khen ou ezmee entheleel: je shere ne Maria: ethmav en Emmanoueel.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the salvation of our father Adam, Hail..., the Mother of the refuge, Hail..., the rejoicing of Eve, Hail..., the joy of all generations.
text.phonics: Shere ne Maria: ep-sotee en adam peniot: Shere…: ethmav empee ma emvot: Shere…: eptheleel en eva: Shere…: ep ounof enni gene’a.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the joy of Abel the just, Hail..., the true Virgin, Hail..., the salvation of Noah, Hail..., the chaste and undefiled.
text.phonics: Shere…: evrashi en abel pee ethmee: Shere…: teeparthenos enta evmee: Shere…: evnohem en-no-eh: Shere…: tee at-tholeb en semne.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the grace of Abraham, Hail..., the unfading crown, Hail..., the redemption of Saint Isaac, Hail..., the Mother of The Holy.
text.phonics: Shere…: epehmot en abra‘am: Shere…: pee eklom en atlom: Shere…: epsotee en isaak pe-ethowab: Shere…: ethmav emve ethowab.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the rejoicing of Jacob, Hail...,  myriads of myriads, Hail...,   the pride of Judah, Hail...:  the mother of the Master.
text.phonics: Shere…: eptheleel enyakob: Shere…: hanethva enkob: Shere…: epshosho en yoda: Shere…: ethmav empee zes pota.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the preaching of Moses, Hail..., the Mother of the Master, Hail...,  the honor of Samuel, Hail...,  the pride of Israel.
text.phonics: Shere…: ep hee oish emmoi sees: Shere…: ethmav empee zes potees: Shere…: eptaio ensamo’eel: Shere…: epshoushou empee isra’eel.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the steadfastness of Job the just, Hail...,  the precious stone, Hail...,  the Mother of the Beloved: Hail...,  the daughter of King David.
text.phonics: Shere…: eptagro en yob pee ethmee: Shere…: pee onee en anamee: Shere…: ethmav empee menreet: Shere…: etsheeree em ep ouro daveed.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the friend of Solomon, Hail...,  the exaltation of the righteous, Hail...,   the redemption of Isaiah, Hail...,  the healing of Jeremiah.
text.phonics: Shere…: te-eshveeree en solomon: Shere…: ep etchee see en-nezee-ke’on: Shere…: epougai en isa-eyas: Shere…: ep-tal-tcho en yeremias.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the knowledge of Ezekiel, Hail...,  the grace of Daniel, Hail...,   the power of Elijah: Hail...,   the grace of Elisha.
text.phonics: Shere…: ep-emi enyezeke-eel: Shere…: kharisto dane-eel: Shere…: etgom en eelias: Shere…: pee ehmot en eleese-os.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, the mother of God: Hail...,  the Mother of Jesus Christ, Hail...,  the beautiful dove, Hail...:  the mother of the Son of God.
text.phonics: Shere…: tee theotokos: Shere…: ethmav enIsos Pekh restos: Shere…: tetshrompee ethnesos: Shere…: ethmav en Eyos Theos.

text.verse: Hail to you Mary, who was witnessed by, all the prophets, and they said.
text.phonics: Shere…: etav ermethre nas: enje ni-eprofee-tees teero: owooh avgo emmos.

text.verse: Behold God the Word, was incarnate of you, in an indescribable, unity.
text.phonics: Hep-pe evnotee pilo-ghos: etafetshee sarx en-kheetee: khen oumeto-wai: en atsaji empesriti.

text.verse: You are truly exalted, more than the rod, of Aaron, O full of grace.
text.phonics: Tetshosee aleethos: ehote pee eshvot: ente A-aron: o-thee ethmeh en ehmot.

text.verse: What is the rod, but Mary, for it is the symbol, of her virginity.
text.phonics: Ashpe pee eshvot: eveel e-Maria: je enthof pe ep-tee-pos: entes parthenia.

text.verse: She conceived and gave birth, without a man, to the son of the Highest, the Word Himself.
text.phonics: She...: As-er-vo-kee as-meesee: khoris seeno sia: em-ep-sheeree emvee etetsho-see: peeloghos en aithia.

text.verse: Through her prayers, and intercessions, O Lord open onto us, the gates of the Church.
text.phonics: Hiten nes evkee: nem nes epresvia: A-oo-own nan eptchois: em evro ente tee-ekek leesia.

text.verse: I entreat you, O mother of God, keep the gates of the church, open to the faithful.
text.phonics: Teetee ho ero: o tee theotokos: ka evro enni ekekleesia: ev-ou-een enneepistos.

text.verse: Let us ask her, to intercede for us, before her Beloved, that He may forgive us.
text.phonics: Marenteeho eros: Ethres tovh egon: nahren pesmenreet: eethref ko nan evol.

text.verse: You are called, O Virgin Mary, the Holy flower, of incense.
text.phonics: Avmoutee ero: Maria tee parthenos: je tee ehreeree ethowab: ente pee estoinofee.

text.verse: Which came out, and blossomed, from the roots of the patriarchs, and the prophets.
text.phonics: Thee etac teeo-o e-epshoi: acveeree evol: khen ethnonee ennee patre yar shees: nem nee eprofeetees.

text.verse: Like the rod, of Aaron the priest, which blossomed, and brought forth fruit.
text.phonics: Em evreetee empee eshvot: ente a-aron pe-oweeb: etaf-veeree evol: af opt enkarpos.

text.verse: For you gave birth to the word, without the seed of man, and your virginity, was not corrupted.
text.phonics: Je-aregvo empee-Loghos: atch ne esperma enromee: es’oi en attako: enje tes parthenia.

text.verse: Wherefore we glorify you, as the Mother of God, ask your Son, to forgive us.
text.phonics: Ethve Vai tentee w-ou ne: hos theotokos: mateeho empe-sheeree: ethervko nan evol.
